name: Flight Sim BeachCraft City
description:
Welcome to BeachCraft City, your mobile flight simulator! Get ready to jump into your very own twin prop airplane and go on a tour of a vast city. Chase down airliners or land on aircraft carriers! Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation with a working virtual cockpit! Just updated with tons of new content and features!

Never before has flying been so realistic & fun on mobile! Enjoy dodging skyscrapers and finding new places to land or crash in this mobile flight simulator. Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the on screen joystick, or tilt controls, to control the aircraft. On screen buttons can be tapped to control throttle, gear, brake, camera, and camera reset. You can reset your airplane in the pause menu.

FEATURES:

*Realistic flight simulator for mobile!

*Working cockpit gauges, controls, and surfaces!

*Classic aircraft carriers to land on

*Airline traffic in the skies.

*5 Cameras to choose from(cockpit, orbit,dynamic, tower, chase).

*Massive city to tour, land, and crash in.
